title: Regarding Riot and the bot issue.
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q6B2BC-K1Jo

Sum's up the thoughts on why bots need to be dealt with fairly well.

replies.body: If an actual player can make a hack that makes bots type "kys", we all win.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PAE08iEv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-04T04:25:40.275+0000)
>
> If an actual player can make a hack that makes bots type "kys", we all win.

holy shit that is genius..... but you'd get done for third party software eventually.
6.31 billion usd in profits in 2k16 but "don't have the resources" to deal with it right now, as seras would say.
lmao downvoted for stating a fact. inconvenient fact for some obviously.
Don't worry, i get down voted for ever making a post because people don't like me.
Bots dont swear. Not a priority.

I game I played a few months ago https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1IrSQx09xMg

9 bots and me
